original_text: And Absalom used to rise early and stand beside the way of the gate. And when any man had a dispute to come before the king for judgment, Absalom would call to him and say, “From what city are you?” And when he said, “Your servant is of such and such a tribe in Israel,”
korean_text: 압살롬이 일찍이 일어나 성문 길 곁에 서서 어떤 사람이든지 송사가 있어 왕에게 재판을 청하러 올 때에 그 사람을 불러 이르되 너는 어느 성읍 사람이냐 하니 그 사람의 대답이 종은 이스라엘 아무 지파에 속하였나이다 하면

sentences.original_text: And Absalom used to rise early
and stand beside the way of the gate
And when any man had a dispute
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 어떤 사람이 다툼이 있을 때

sentences.original_text: to come before the king for judgment
and say, "From what city are you?"
"Your servant is of such and such a tribe in Israel"
